Na szczęście gospodarze udostępniają parking przy budynku - duże udogodnienie. Mieszkanie jest przestronne, jasne, z balkonem z pięknym widokiem na morze. Zaraz po drugiej stronie ulicy jest sklep. reviews.comments: Overall my wife and I had a really lovely time in Mrs. Abramowitz's home. It was a very short walk to the beach and was perfectly located for our needs (nearby wedding). Maayans place in Tzukei Yam is proof that apparently heaven is 25 min away from Tel Aviv…

Great view of the Mediterranean from bedroom window, a two minute walk to the beach, stunning balcony with a sea breeze that seems to never stop and an overall great energy and tasteful vibe to the house.

Great kitchen equipped with almost all you’ll ever need, a 6 minute drive to a shopping center for when you run out of carb, wine or sunscreen & Aria (the cute black house cat) is a nice and very non-demanding addition to this sea overlooking hacienda.



Will most definitely visit here again in the future!!!

Отдыхали в Нетании у хозяина Stas, в сентябре 2018 года. Квартира соответствует описанию и фото, если возникали какие то трудности Stas быстро отвечал и помогал решить проблему. Расположение квартиры нам очень понравилось все в доступности и море и магазины и центральная площадь! В целом впечатление осталось хорошее и хотим поблагодарить хозяина за гостеприимство!
Appartement propre et bien situe

Хорошее расположение квартиры, не далеко от моря, рядом достаточно продуктовых магазинов и кафе, при этом ночью достаточно тихо. Квартира перед наши прибытием была практически не убрана, пол был грязным, в ванной комнате грибок, не было чашек для чая, постельное белье застиранное, серо-желтого цвета. Часть полотенец воняла рыбой, а часть была абсолютно новыми ни разу не стиранными из магазина. Хозяин, доброжелательный, приятный в общении, охотно отвечает на вопросы, даже пообещал устранить замеченные нами недостатки, но до нашего отъезда не устранил ничего. Еще один неприятный момент, хозяин потребовал плату за электричество хотя о доп. оплате во время бронирования не было указано ничего. Сам же хозяин при этом спокойно пользовался стиральной и сушильной машинами, подключенными к счетчику, по которому нам пришлось оплатить электричество. Кроме указанной проблемы с чашками, кухня оборудована вполне нормально. В целом, если самостоятельно убрать квартиру, перестирать полотенца и не переживать из-за доброжелательного равнодушия хозяина и неожиданных дополнительных расходов, вариант для проживания хороший.
Мне все понравилось! И место и пляж рядом, рестораны и магазины! И квартира! Все классно!

Замечательная квартира со свежим ремонтом и мебелью, полностью соответствует описанию. Доброжелательные хозяева, дом расположен на тихой улице, до моря 10 минут, до центральной площади 7 минут, супермаркет в 5 минутах, рынок - 15-20 минут. На соседней улице есть бесплатная парковка. Полностью рекомендую.

reviews.comments:
NICE PLACE. Host was responsive. EXCELLENT location. AMAZING VIEW.
This apartment would be perfect for a group of 20-something friends, young singles or married couples, even a family with older children. As a family with kids under 5 and a nervous grandmother, we had a few safety concerns that would not be an issue with the suitable age group.
Great host, fantastic place!
amazing

Thank you so much! The place was amazing, perfect location, stunning view, very spacious, comfortable and we really had a great weekend. The host was very happy to answer all out queries at a very fast response time. Would definitely recommend and looking forward to coming back again in the future.

The flat does not seem to have been updated since the seventies, but it has been well maintained and was clean and very spacious. It is listed as a two bedroom but in fact there is a covered and closed balcony which serves as another small room, which makes separating the kids a lot easier!

Overall, we were very happy with our stay and had a great time. The proximity to the beach is great and the pool was fantastic. The view from the balcony is phenomenal and makes up for any flaws in the apartment. The apartment is also extremely spacious.
However, the kitchen was very basically equipped. There is no air-conditioning in the main room (but there are very good portable units in the bedrooms) but because of the high floor, it really wasn’t required. There are also a few issues with regard to safety for small children - most notably the lack of locks on the windows to the balcony and the low-ish ledge over the edge of the balcony. The master bedroom’s shutters were missing some slats which meant that mornings started early! Having said this, Ilan was very receptive to the feedback we provided and I hope he’ll correct the issues we raised with him.
All was amazing. Best View Ever.
Huge apartment right on the beach!! the view is amazing!! would definitely recommend!

This view is amazing. All we wanted to do was sit and enjoy the view. The apartment is spacious and Ilan was very responsive to any question or request.
We missed the part about no ac on the listing and for the most part was ok temperature-wise as the apt had great breezes. The pool was lovely, but is an additional cost (which is also in the apt description). We hope to come back. Thanks Ilan!!
Ilan’s place is a large apartment in a prime location with a remarkable view. Ilan was always extremely responsive, patient, and helpful in preparation for our stay. Thank you Ilan!!

I've never given someone a one star rating on air bnb before until now. From the very beginning I can see that Oren was extremely picky with his pool. On the second day me and my kids did some normal splashing like everyone does in a pool and for about 5 minutes we created some waves - normal behavior. Some water obviously exited the pool  which is still every normal. Later that evening he calls me over angry and scolds me for my behavior with my kids and that too much water leaving the pool is bad and can potentially damage the filter. He also criticized me for letting my kids be on their rafts/bugie boards even though he never told me before that we couldn't use it. The next morning we saw that the pool is completely green! So of course, Oren blames us for it because some how by us making some waves and water level dropping caused the pool to turn green. I grew up with a swimming pool and never experienced this in my life. It was obvious that the pool wasn't taken care of properly and wanted to blame us for it. We decided to leave a day early since we couldn't swim and I sent a request to him to change the reservation to 2 nights and he still hasn't accepted the request. I"m also a host on airbnb and I have never stooped this low with a a guest (called us crazy a few times to our faces). The deck also is very old and gives off a reddish rust material that stained all our clothes and we were still unable to remove it. In addition, I expected this to be a PRIVATE pool but it clearly wasn't. He can see everything from inside his house AND he told us later that he had cameras and was filming everything! This was a terrible experience and ruined our vacation. Think twice before booking this airbnb.
reviews.response: Eitan and his family caused serious damage to the swimming pool systems by throwing glasses and food items into the drainage systems, causing the systems to become clogged.  Really dangerous to host them!

Very good stay. Strongly recommended!

היו ״שתי״ שבאחת מהם לא היה אף לא כסא פלסטיק אחד לשבת עליו.
הבריכה עצמה נראית מעולה. אך שיצאנו ממנה כל הבגדים שלנו נהיו כתומים , ולא זה לא ירד בכביסה.
לאחר שניסינו להגיד לבעל המקום אם אפשר להכנס לחצר ולא לבריכה! גם בלילה, הוא התחיל לצעוק ולדבר אלינו בשפה לא מתאימה, ואנו חיילים שבאנו להנות מחופשה, ובמקום זאת מצאנו את עצמינו מתווכחים עם בן אדם שאמור לארח אותנו עד כדי התערבות גורמים חיצוניים.
החוסר עדכון בפרטים החשובים לפני החופשה והחוויה עצמה הייתה פשוט נוראית מבחינתינו ולכן לא ממליצים בכלל להגעה למקום המדובר.
בעל הבית אינו בחור , וחוויה כזאת נקווה שלא נחווה יותר.

אורן עצמו היה מקסים וגם המקום נראה מהמם! המטבח היה מאובזר, הכל היה נקי ויפה וקיבלנו מענה מאורן מיד כששאלנו משהו, אבל:
הגענו שלוש חברות לערב נעים ושקט, בישלנו ושתינו יין, הדלקנו מוזיקה (לא רועשת בכלל) ואז התחילו הבעיות.
כל חמש דקות קיבלנו הודעות על זה שאנחנו עושות רעש, גם כשכיבינו את המוזיקה זה המשיך. אני לא יודעת מה קורה עם השכנים, אבל כל דבר הפריע להם. הם טענו שאנחנו קופצות, כאשר הדבר היחיד שעשינו זה לבשל פסטה. אולי בגלל שהבית עשוי עץ שומעים כל דבר קטן, אבל זה הרס מאוד את האווירה ומצאנו את עצמינו יוצאות מהדירה ששכרנו ומסתובבות בפארקים באיזור על מנת שנוכל לדבר בכיף בלי שיעירו לנו כל רגע.
אם אתם מחפשים מקום להעביר בו לילה זה אחלה מקום, אבל תצטרכו לשמור על שקט מוחלט.

description: Номер большой (28 м.кв.), уютный. Есть мебель, душ, туалет, кондиционер, телевизор, мини-кухня с посудой и электроприборами. Ежедневно проводится уборка и замена полотенец (кроме субботы; полотенца для субботы гости получают в пятницу; убока может быть в субботу вечером) Замена постельного - 2 раза в неделю. В шаговой доступности рестораны, кафе, бары, магазины, турбюро и море. В нескольких метрах - супермаркет. Для удобства гостей бесплатный Wi-Fi во всех номерах. Кровать -  1,8×2м, есть диван.The spaceУникальность нашему жилью придает его расположение и небольшие размеры нашей гостиницы, для любителей тихого, спокойного отдыха.Комната-студия большая (28 м.кв.) чистая и уютная. Имеется вся необходимая мебель, душ, туалет, кондиционер, телевизор, мини-кухня с посудой и электроприборами. Ежедневно производится уборка и замена полотенец (кроме субботы либо в субботу вечером, либо гости получают дополнительные полотенца для субботы в пятницу). Замена постельного белья - два раза в неделю. В шаговой доступности все развлечения, рестораны, кафе, магазины, туристические бюро и, конечно же, море. Недавно в нескольких метрах открылся новый супермаркет. Специально для удобства гостей мы добавили бесплатный Wi-Fi - интернет во все номера. Кровать в номере двуспальная широкая (1,8×2м), так же есть диван.   В номере могут расположиться до 4 человек.
additional_house_rules: Номер включает мини-кухню со всей необходимой посудой и средствами для ее мытья.
interaction: Наш коллектив всегда на связи с  гостями непосредственно, а так же по телефону, sms, WhatsApp, Viber.
transit: Вблизи есть парковка, автобусная остановка, стоянка такси.

name: Pastoral relaxing getaway ,farm outside Tel Aviv
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Dedicated workspace - A desk or table with a chair and space for a laptop.

description: A fully equipped apartment on a big ranch with a huge beautiful garden,  , just 15 minutes from Tel Aviv and close to the beach.You will wake up to the sound of chirping birds and chill out poolside with a glass of local wine. Hertzeliya district is only a few minutes ride away with lots of  restaurants, bars, beach, shopping, etc.The spaceA private apartment, separate from the main house and is fully equipped (double sized bed, refrigerator, shower, air conditioner, and Wifi) with all amenities and perks you may need (towels, toiletries, kettle, iron, etc) and  treat for your first breakfast in the refrigerator  from your host 😋.The apartment is baby friendly :) crib and other amenities are available upon request .Guest accessSeparate entrance to the apartment, with complete privacy. Access to the common area, with a huge lawn, private sitting areas next to the apartment .Other things to noteYou can book a guided horse ride to the beach.There is a grocery store and a local restaurant within 5 minutes walking distance.
additional_house_rules: Be friendly to the animals, but don't let them in the apartment.
interaction: Any time you  have question or need help except late  in the evening or early in the morning
transit: There are buses and shared route taxis you can take to Tel Aviv from the main road. However, it’s easier to get around with a car or taxi.

reviews.comments:
Look no more! Ora’s place is where you want to stay!
Ora was a kind and generous host with beautiful property and amenities. The room was inviting, clean, full of light, with a very comfortable bed, and anything else you can think of- from equipped kitchen to clean, beautiful spacious bathroom.
Ora stocked the fridge with some local fare of fruit, vegetables, cheese, eggs and milk, and made me feel at home.
The property is gorgeous, and I enjoyed catching some sun in the lovely sitting area.
Next time I need a place in Israel, I will be back at Ora’s place.
Highly recommend.

Ora’s place is magical. The unit is great and clean and the yard is amazing huge and beautiful. Ora is a great host, very responsive and caring.
Highly recommended if you’re looking for a quiet and cozy place nearby Herzliya and Tel Aviv.

reviews.comments:

Ora is great host and responds immediately to our request (including when we had to leave earlier).

If you like the quiet and simplicity of country life, while still in the heart of Israel., this is the right place.

We enjoyed the big beautiful yard and playing with the dog.

Ora’s place was absolutely great. Clean, airy, bright, nicely decorated, huuugge backyard with hot tub and pool, lovely setting, great peaceful secluded private location yet close to highways, close to shfayim shopping center and Yakum center where you can get great coffee and food and they are both open on weekends!
A great falafel stop right at the entrance to Rishpon that also serves coffee and pastries.
Ora is a great host, easy to communicate with and a lovely person. She has very cute dog and cats that are great to interact with. They stay away from the airbnb unit but are most friendly if you approach them :)

reviews.comments:
Ora has a big ranch and it’s actually a quite nice to escape from Tel Aviv and opportunity to enjoy the chilled farm life in the village. Rishpon itself is a rural village within bicycle/ walking distance to the beach. Tel Aviv however is really around the corner, in fact just a 15 min car drive from there and the good thing is that you never have to look (or pay) for parking. I’ve heard it must be great to go horseback riding in the Rishpon area or on the beach. Ora can hook you up with people that either rent horses or join organised rides.

Ora was a wonderful host, she has a sweet personality and was always willing to help if we needed anything. The apartment itself is cute, the bed-room is quite big and there is a bathroom, toilet, small kitchen & huge walk-in closet. Fresh towels, coffee & tea were waiting on our arrival. The best part of the apartment is the beautiful garden in which it is located and which you can use as well. You wake up each morning with the sounds of all sorts of birds. Really a little paradise!

Ora has been a great and an cheerful host. She has done everything to welcome me. Everything was clean, towels  and even food for breakfast and more and wine Ora has organized. The first evening, i asked about a Falafel and she brought me there and we ate a Falafel together. Her ranch is amazing and with big land, quiet place. The cosy one room apartment was very private, so that i could relax. TV, internet, all what's needed! Would book again. I was her first airbnb-guest and i do hope, to have set a standard for further guests.

The main bedroom has ceiling fan and there is another mobile fan.I live alone in the small house on the back side of the yard, with a Fence between.

reviews.comments: We loved our stay at Matan's beach-side house. The beach is an easy 3 minute walk from the house, and the sound of the waves can be heard from both the bedrooms. The house had everything we needed, including a fully fitted kitchen and lines for drying towels and bathing suits. Everything was very clean and the garden was a treat!

We can't thank Matan enough for this phenomenal unforgettable stay and experience. This home is so special, has happy and relaxing ambience, it is spacious but warm at the same time, has super hip character, and the fresh laundry smell is gorgeous. Matan is a super clean, prompt, and accommodative host, he thought of everything. After 14 hours of flight, coming from Chicago, we were welcomed with the best little details, like fresh homemade amazing bread he just baked for us, a bottle of Barkan wine, as well as abundance of fresh cut flower bouquets which feels the air with smells of joy.
Communications were super quick and easy. He provided with tons of good information about the area and home and was always reachable.
This unique and homey experience is located at the coolest neighborhood - we love the narrow street passages, and the neighborhood vibes.
If you are interested in a quaint piece of true local Israel - this is the place to be! Located steps from one of the most beautiful Israeli Mediterranean beaches, near the G'dur nature preserve, a piece of heaven on earth (wish I could upload pictures) - this place is real!!
We will come back again and again, it's just what we needed!

The house with its furniture is extremely modest, but it's recently renovated and very clean.

Matan has a good taste (to my humble opinion) and a big heart. We felt as if we were staying in a friend's place.

Amazing natural beach towards South, by foot.

Very private.

Matan's place is pleasant, the house is sweet and well equipped. On July 2021, the city was building a new path to the beach, so getting to the beach requires a bit of a detour. Once construction is complete, it seems the path to the beach will be short and comfortable by foot. If you're a family or have stuff to carry to the beach, you can take a 2 minutes drive to the parking lot of the Olga beach.
Matan was extremely communicative and helpful, a great host.

The house looks great in and out and is located close to a beautiful walking dune area along the beach. Lovely house and garden, well equipped and large enough for our group of 3 adults and 2 small children. Matan was very welcoming, great communication too. Warmly recommended.
We had a great time at Matan's place. Excellent location, quiet place, excellent contact.

The place is charming and has very good vibes. Just 2 minutes walk from the beach (which is also a surfing beach!). Very spacious, we were a couple but there is space for much larger group. We had a great time :)
Minimalist place, really close to the beach. Simple and charming
A cool house and yard and a great location close to the beach
האירוח אצל מתן היה מצויין! קרוב לים, חוף מקסים, הבית פשוט אך נקי מאד. מתן היה מאד נגיש וגמיש עם שעות הצ'ק אין והצ'ק אאוט ובכלל זמין לכל שאלה ועניין. נהנינו מאד! תודה!
היה לנו מושלם, הבית קסום ומתן נחמד והתקשורת איתו נעימה. ממליצה בחום.
דירה חמודה, נהנינו מאד. מתן נותן מענה מהיר לכל שאלה ובקשה.
בית כפרי וחמוד ממש, מרווח ונקי מאוד.  הליכה של שתי דקות מהים ולמי שגולש אפשר לראות את מצב הגלים מהחצר האחורית. היה נהדר
מתן מארח מקסים, הדירה נעימה והחוף פשוט מהמם (:
היה כיף להתארח, הבית מהמם, נקי ונוח! מאוד קרוב לחוף יפה ושקט. מאוד ממליצה :)

reviews.comments: Very cool outdoor space!
Great location. We loved the rooftop!
Great place! Great location!

Hands down the best part of this apartment is the amazing deck, which is basically the same size as the apartment itself. The apartment is simple, clean, and super centrally located on a quiet residential street so it felt like home. One note, the kitchen is TINY so don't expect todo much cooking here. But with all the great food to be had in Tel Aviv, it's all good.

Bed was comfy, though the pillows were not very big or fluffy, but no big deal for me personally.

All conversation was handled remotely, so sometimes responses were a bit slow in coming, but generally good, and overall I do recommend staying here. Oh, do note there is only 1 AC unit so I had to sleep with the bedroom door open (which was fine and the AC worked REALLY well), so bear that in mind if you are sharing.

One weird note: on 2 of the 4 nights I stayed, the neighbors made an ungodly racket, like large things falling or furniture being moved, around 2am. It scared the living daylights out of me! Otherwise, didn't hear or see a soul.

The apartment is very well located with great access to almost anything one wants to do.
Car parking is a problem (as can be expected in the center of a dense city). the outdoor part of the apartment is delightful especially late in the evening. Enjoyed sitting there and watching the sky. We slept well on the beds which are in very good condition.

Clean, great location, comfortable bedding, awesome room deck.

I was part of a group of three staying in Tel Aviv for a night. Two of us missed our flight, so I had to pass off the check in to my brother. Eli was very responsive and understanding of the change. We got in super smoothly.

The roof deck is idyllic. The apartment is airy and full of light. The bed was comfy and one of us slept on one of the futon couches. The location was also great! We were able to walk out and be at the beach or within a couple blocks of lots of cool bars and coffee shops.

Street parking was a challenge, but there was an affordable parking garage a block away that Eli pointed us to.
Loved the space! Location was great and super affordable!
Eli’s place is beautiful. The garden roof deck was so beautiful. Eli was very responsive and helpful. Did definitely stay here again.
Eli’s airbnb is beautiful! it’s near the beach and local restaurants/bars. the deck is amazing!! great way to spend time together. would recommend!

Very good experience, from the beginning till the end. Eli was very professional and accommodating. The apartment is located in an amazing location, close to everything but still very quiet. Great balcony!

Super cute apt in the heart of Tel Aviv. Fast access to the beach and cafes, shopping and anything you know Tel Aviv for.
The terrace is amazing and big. During morning till noon you have enough shadow to sit outside and have a great breakfast.
The kitchen is tiny but with a creative mind you can definitely work with it.
If you need to make some laundry it’s around the corner and also uncomplicated.
Communication with Eli was easy and great.

My parents stayed there while visiting me in the city. Beautiful apartment and quiet stay. In the middle of everything but still so silent.
There is no ac in the bedroom but the ac in the living room cools the whole place nicely!
The apartment is super bright, so it’s not a place to sleep in until noon. Didnt bother them
There is one floor of stairs to climb, so the guests should be able to do that.
Definitely recommended!
fantastic place!

We had a great stay and everything was as advertised!

Thanks Eli
Highly recommend !!!

Elis place really is a paradise garden and a hidden gem in the midtown of Tel Aviv. The style is simple and well chosen. The bed is big and very comfortable. We spend wonderful times on the great terrace and walked just a couple minutes to the beach. Will definitely stay at Elis place again when we come back to Tel Aviv.
Awesome flat, very central and close to the beach. The rooftop is impressive. I recommend this flat.
Amazing amazing amazing!!!! Super recommended for the super fair price, really good location, and the balcony is beyond amazing
Excellent location, beautiful rooftop to relax with a nice breeze after a hot day on the beach. Everything is with walking distance or reachable with line 4 or 5.

Over many years my first apartment in Tel Aviv completely without cockroaches - not only on the rooftop but also not in the building and actually also not in the street.
I will never forget that and I think that would be the main reason for me to book this apartment again.
Another great plus point of this apartment is a huge cosy terrace on the rooftop with amazing view and beautiful plants, which afford a lot of care.
The kitchen is very small. there is no stove, the fridge is also small and was broken during our stay but Eli managed to replace it directly on the next day - we appreciate that a lot.
The things that I personally didn’t like were:
1. the entrance to the apartment through the bedroom (we had a child so it was very inconvenient) and last but not least
2. only one air-conditioner for the whole apartment in another room.

The building has an elevator but remember that you have to go one floor a feet to achieve the rooftop - for people who have problems with that.

The neighbourhood is absolutely fantastic: beautiful, quiet, clean yet not far away from gastronomically overloaded and noisy dizingoff street and very close to the sea with a couple of convenient 24 hours open shops to buy everything that you need and relatively affordable Shufersal shop on the Ben Yehuda street.

We and our neighbors were disturbed by the huge amount of cats visiting us during the night and making a lot of noise and urinating around. I’m not sure if the owner can do something about it but it would be really great.

Eli was extremely helpful and responded very fast I wish all hosts would be like this.

All in all I would definitely book this apartment again and recommend it to other people because its very clean and beautiful.
Great locations, very clean and nice balcony!

This place is a fantastic choice. The terrace is the highlight. The living space is ample. I stayed for 8 days. Clean, comfortable and a great location. Short walk to the beach. Short walk to major hotels if you want to book day trips. All the amenities of grocery stores restaurants. I would stay here again.

Eli‘s place is as described and shown in the pictures. The location is perfect - quite at night, but close to the beach and main streets for shopping and food!

The terrace is great and we enjoyed the coffee outside in the morning as well as a drink in the evening.

The apartement is small, but works well for two!

Would stay here again and we can highly recommend!

Btw, the kitchen offers a water heater, nespresso machine and a cooking plate.

Thank you for everything Eli.
Best location in the city.
Amazing apartment with beautiful roof garden.
Great place with a beautiful rooftop garden. Close to everything. Better suites couples or single guests because there is only one bed + 2 small sofas
Lovely place with cool location

Great appartement with an amazing huge rooftop !
The location is perfect near the beach and the restaurants.
Thanks a lot and we warmly recommend !

The apartment is special because of its terrace. The terrace is almost as big as the living quarters. Keep that in mind, as space inside is limited (best for 1 person only).
Kitchen is really just a kitchenette - do not expect a coffee machine. There is no dining table inside!

The location is great: in the middle of everything and absolutely no street noise (incoming planes are sometimes to be heard and seen - but not bothersome).

There was a leak with water dripping from the ceiling in the bed room. No fix during my stay.

Lovely apartment at a perfect location in Tel Aviv! Just few minutes walking from the beach and main restaurant streets, but in a quiet house and street. The balcony is golden, overall it's a stylish and great place to stay. Eli was very helpful and very responsive. Recommend the place for a stay in Tel Aviv.
Amazing terrace, lovely place, really a relaxing place close to the beach and to restaurants and pubs
Great, central place. Great !!!!! Terrace.

The flat looks exactly as good as on the photos.
I can only recommend! We had a pleasent and uncomplicated stay!
The rooftop terrace is amazing and the highlight of the appartment. Location is also perfect! Near to the beach and good restaurants.

Excellent location and beautiful apartment with a stand out balcony. Eli the host was very accessible and helpful. Highly recommend this apartment to anyone wanting to stay near both centre and beach in Tel Aviv.
Great location. Beautiful terrace!!
Super place, amazing location, highly recommended
The apartment is well situated, the real difference is the wonderful Terrasse. Kitchen not super convenient for cooking but why doing so with so many good restaurants around :-)
It is simply amazing. In realty the apartment is even better then on the pictures. Great stay and perfect host! We will come back.
Eli has a really great place, especially the terrace covered with flowers! Super bright in the mornings... Can definitely recommend and would stay again.
Great Place near the beach, but bit pricey for the size of the flat.

We are a couple who stayed for 6 days in Eli’s apartment, October 2017. The apartment is situated a short walk from the beach, and a short walk from buzzling nighlife at Dizengoff St., supermarkets, etc. This is quite a perfect spot.

But the real beauty is the very large, sunny terrace. There is no noise whatsoever, even during the day. But a lot of sun! Also, the apartment feels spacious and correlates with the pictures in the advert.

Eli is a professional, and the 3-4 times we had questions, we received reply within no more than 10-15 minutes.

In short, this apartment is definitely the place we would want to come back to for any future visits to Tel Aviv. - Thank you!
The apartment was very clean and the location was pretty nice (5 mins to the beach). We had a great time here.

The apartment is even nicer than the pictures show, we enjoyed our stay, especially the exceptional roof terrace! Perfect location and the communication with Eli was very easy. He was very easily reachable and helpful. I would definitely recommend this stay!

We had a perfect week in a typical flat in Tel Aviv in downtown. Very close to restaurants, venues and beaches ! Eli is such a perfect host and very responsive to our asking !
We plan to come back next year just for the pleasure to enjoy the terrasse once again !
Great place
Great apartment. Really nice roof terrace. Very clean and a good location. Close to the beach and lively areas, but on a quiet street so no noise problems.
We had a lovley stay at the apartement and we definitely like to coming back! Eli & Laurent were great hosts and we really enjoyed our vacation!

Sehr schöne, romantische und gemütliche Unterkunft. Ich habe mich mit meinem Mann wohl gefühlt. Würde jederzeit gerne wiederkommen
Susanne
Terrasse ist das absolute Highlight der Wohnung. Lage zum Meer super, ruhige Umgebung. Tolles Quartier. Saubere Wohnung. Gut ausgestattet.
Vraiment un bel espace pour profiter de la vie à Tel Aviv. L’endroit est tranquille tout en étant près de tout. La terrasse est vraiment très agréable.
Die Unterkunft war hervorragend gelegen, ruhig aber trotzdem mitten im Geschehen.
Endroit idéal !! Eli est un hôte attentionné et super agreable

Superbe localisation, toute proche de la mer,

Parfait Rooftop avec une vue sur les toits de la ville,

Eli est un hôte particulièrement disponible et à l'écoute,

Nous reviendrons sans aucune hésitation !

Super terrasse...
Super lit
Manque de rangement
Pas de possibilité de cuisiner et de prendre ses repas dans l'appartement....

Nous avons passé un séjour très agréable dans l'appartement d'Eli. La terrasse est incroyable, le lieu inondé de lumière, notre hôte toujours à l'écoute de nos moindres soucis ou interrogations. Merci pour tout !

reviews.comments: Location, location, location! This studio is in a phenomenal location near the golf…and perfect for a weekend. Place is renovated and clean. Keren is a wonderful host and goes above and beyond to accommodate her guests. Highly recommend!

Keren’s place was the perfect home away from home for me. The studio is well equipped and you can’t beat the location and the amenities at the facility. Keren is super attentive and kind. She even offered to stock the fridge before my arrival and it was just perfect. From the apartment you can walk (20 min)or drive (5 min) to the beautiful Golden Beach or explore additional amazing beaches in the area. The Cesarea port has beautiful restaurants all within a 10 min drive. The nearby town of Pardes Hannah has a hip vibe, with countless opportunities for relaxing spas, massage, Water Shiatsu and much more. The studio has everything you need for a carefree vacation, including ample free parking, pool, gym, tennis courts as well as serene, quiet and blissful surroundings. I will certainly stay here in my next visit to Israel!
Great host.
Keren was exceptionally hospitable and kind. Her apartment is both comfortable and practical. If you’re staying in Caesarea, Keren’s place is a great place to stay.
Check in was easy, and Keren's place was tasteful and very clean
Great unit located in an amazing location.
I had high expectations and they were met.
Very stylish and modern comfort. Very clean. Loved it!  5 star hotel quality.
Great flat, good location. I would recommend all
Fantastic and comfortable apartment that is close (5min drive) to many of the attractions in the area. There is also a supermarket located nearby.
lovely small place for a couple's getaway. Super close to Caesarea National Park and other attractions. Great hospitality by Keren.
lovely small place for a couple's getaway. Everything you need for a weekend away. Super close to Caesarea National Park and other attractions. Lovely grounds.
Keren is a fantastic host. She provided fast, easy guidelines that made my stay in her studio much more pleasant. I strongly recommend her apartment for a short stay in central or north Israel.

We had a nice weekend in Keren's place. The studio is small but comfortable for two and has all you need for a stay. The complex is quiet with a lot of green areas, pool , gym and a great playground. The Caesarea beach is just few km away. Definitely recommend.
All was good, as expected
Great apartment . It was a wonderful stay.
Very clean, nicely appointed studio flat with all amenities. It felt like a lot of thought had gone into making guests feel welcome
A very comfortable place to stay at with amazing facilities around and just a few minutes away from some very nice tourist attractions.
Everything was fine. Great property.
Great apartment in a great location.
Very nice place close to Ceasarea old port. Access to swimming pool is a bonus to your stay. Keren is very caring host and I wish I could stayed longer.
Very nice and well structured apartment. It was easy to find a parking spot. We enjoyed our stay very much!
Very cozy apartment in a nice area
a wonderful choice keren is the best hostess

Great location - not far from the C-Center with its supermarket, shops and restaurant and not too far from the beach, only a 5 minute drive.

This one-room apartment is small, but very modern, and has all the basics one needs for a short stay. The bed was very comfy!

The complex itself has lots of amenities like swimming pool and fitness space. And, being part of a complex, the security was excellent.

Keren was very responsive and answered my calls or emails immediately.

קרן מאוד זמינה.

Отличная хозяйка. Апартаменты хорошо оборудованы, но маленькие, как номер в отеле. Хороши для кратковременного проживания. Узкая кровать. Достоинства: прекрасная территория, бассейн, фитнес, безопасность, ухоженность территории.

היה ממש מעולה ! דירה מהממת ומיקום נחמד מאוד , קרוב לים וכמה דקות מהמרכז קניות.
קרן עזרה לנו בשעת הצורך והייתה ממש מקסימה.
הדירה של קרן מאוד יפה, יש בה כל מה שאנחנו היינו צריכים, המיקום מצויין, הקשר עם קרן היה מאוד טוב, אני ממליצה בחום וחושבים לחזור לדירה.
המיקום של הדירה נהדר. הדירה מאובזרת בכל מה שצריך. והקשר עם קרן המארחת נעים וענייני מאוד. ממליצים בחום.
הדירה מהממת מסודרת נקייה הבריכה ממש כיפית מקום טוב אנשים טובים אפשר לנוח בכיף מקום שקטה קרן תמיד פנויה עונה מהר נשמח לחזור ולהמליץ תודה רבה על הכל היה מושלם
יש את כל מה שצריך בחדר, הכל נקי ומוקפד. המתחם עצמו גם מתוחזק היטב והבריכה ממש נחמד
Joli appartement dans un complexe avec de très bons équipements et particulièrement bien tenu
מיקום מעולה

דירת סטודיו של חדר.דירה נקיה מאד! בעיצוב מודרני. מיטה בעלת מזרון מאד נוח.אמבטיה חדשה ויפה! נמצאת במתחם נופש מקסים, מול הים,עם בריכה נקיה .וחדר כושר . נהנינו מאד. קרן נחמדה מאד , ענתה מהר מאד לכל שאלה. ממליצה בחום!

Kompaktes, sauberes, gut eingerichtetes Studio. Geeignet mit Auto, sonst wohl eher nicht. Ist eine "gated community" und von der Atmosphäre her eher wie ein Hotel. Sehr unkompliziertes Einchecken, die Gastgeberin antwortet immer umgehend - tipptopp!

name: 3 bedrooms Frishman St. - 5mn from the beach
amenities: Essentials - Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper
Kitchen - Space where guests can cook their own meals
Dishes and silverware - Bowls, chopsticks, plates, cups, etc.

description: Welcome to my beautiful apartment which is located in the famous Frishman street. 3 bedrooms apartment. Fully equipped kitchen and bathrooms.  5mn walking to Frishman Beach and Dizengoff Square. It's a perfect apartment for families!

reviews.comments: This apartment is absolutely wonderful!  The location couldn’t be better and the host is very communicative, flexible and accommodating.  I would stay here again in a heartbeat.
Amazing host, and awesome apartment! We had a great time.. We also asked for a late checkout and they were able to accommodate! Thanks again.

Had a great time, location is amazing, steps from restaurants, bars and beach! The unit was super clean and welcoming, AC in every room,
Highly recommend and will definitely go again!

The good:
- This place has the best location! it is situated perfectly in the center of Tel Aviv, near restaurants, bars, the beach, and everything you want to do in the city. And it is in a quiet building, no excessive noise.
- The apartment is big. It is spacious and very impressive. very good place to host your friends for dinner, or have a family vacation.
- The water heater works great, and the water pressure is wonderful in the shower.

The bad:
- The apartment cleanliness is not good. we arrived to a dusty apartment with unclean floors, surfaces, toilets, and dishes. Even though the host immediately responded by sending the apartment's cleaning lady the next day, he did not instruct her to clean the entire apartment and wanted us to tell him exactly what to clean. At the end we were left to deal with a very angry cleaning lady who speaks only Russian. The apartment was left unclean after she left.
- The bedroom TV does not work at all (it turns on, but that's about it). Both the living room and bedroom TVs are of very poor quality (not even smart TVs) and not good size.
- The other 2 bedrooms have very small beds, so know that it is more suitable for a family with kids rather than a group of friends.
Amazing place with the best location in all of Tel Aviv!
Great clean apartment in a good location with responsive hosts.
Great apartment. Perfect location in Tel Aviv. Communication with host was quick and easy. Would love to stay again!
Great all around. Very nice place. Makes it hard to leave.

Adi’s place was great. Smooth check-in process (with someone waiting for us to let us in earlier than the official check-in time), modern furnishings, good kitchen, and laundry (washer + dryer) in-unit.

Location was good too — 10 minute walk to the beach, and close to several good restaurants (we really liked Anastasia, especially for vegans).

Exactly as listed, would stay again!
The entire experience staying at the apartment was great. We enjoyed it very much and highly recommend it.
Perfecto location. Walking distance to everything. They were very flexible to help us leave luggage and check in and check out. I will recommend it 100%
reviews.response: Thanks!

reviews.comments: Adi's place is a modern, spacious, apartment in the perfect location for a taste of the Tel Aviv social scene.  As has been said before, the space is even better than the pictures describe. We couldn't be more pleased with having stayed there and would do so again when visiting Tel Aviv.

Adi is a wonderful host, and the location of this apartment is in the heart of tel aviv. You walk right outside and have so many bars and restaurants to choose from, and everything is walking distance. We had a wonderful stay!
Beautiful apartment in an incredible location!!!   Highly recommend!

We loved it here! Had 5 people total and it slept us all easily and there was enough couch/living space for us all to hang out in the evenings. Really close to the beach and downtown. Highly recommend!
Excellent location, beautiful apartment, great decor.   Would definitely book again

Amazing location, 5 minutes away from the beach walking distance, best area in the city, great kitchen.
We had great responses for the check in, and also left the key inside the apartment after a High Holiday and we were able to get back in within a short period of time.
I highly recommend this place.
Great location - super central! Apt itself is very clean. Was a great stay!

Staying with Adi was a blessing she was helpful and answered each and every question we had. The location is amazing and is right in the center of where you want to be in Tel Aviv. Great food near by and great beaches. Couldn’t have had a better place to stay at. Thank you Adi!!
Perfect location. Clean and specious. Really enjoyed my stay.

We had a very good time in Tel Aviv. The location is excellent and the apartment is bright clean and spacious. Do not be concerned about the exterior and lot of the apartments look old and unkempt from the outside. Inside however the apartment was clean and modern and spacious and could easily and comfortably accommodate our family of 6. The  wine and cookies were also a thoughtful touch.

Great location, nice large living area. It was not very noisy, as some customers commented. 5 min walk to a nice kid friendly beach. Beach toys were a plus for our 5 y. old. Adi had a great communication throughout.
Great Location for Tel Aviv, nearby restaurants and beautiful beaches, very cozy place

We really enjoyed our stay in this apartment.  It is very central, easy walk to the great beach and fantastic cafes for breakfast and dinner.  The kitchen has all that you need and it only takes minutes to grab something across the street, one of the best pita places in Israel is two steps away.   There is a construction going on nearby, which didn't really bother us, because we were gone most of the day, but you might want to check with the host, if you have issues with that.  We really loved this place and highly recommend it!

Me and my sister had a great time staying here.  Wonderful space and very seamless check in and check out process. The bedrooms are spacious and can easily accommodate a large group. The kitchen is large with a large table to accommodate all your guests. Great location. highly recommend!

The location was great! Quick walk to the beach and to Dizengoff street, where all the action is. The apartment itself met our needs but we expected more. There was a bottle of wine waiting for us which was a nice plus.

This apartment was very beautiful and clean! It was in the perfect location in Tel Aviv. Right next to all the best restaurants. The host was prompt with answering any questions that I had. I will definitely stay there again when I come back to Israel. Thank you for making my family and I have such a wonderful stay.

Adi and Ido were great hosts. We had a comfortable stay at their place. Check-in instructions were clear and Ido (Adi's husband) communicated promptly on (Hidden by Airbnb) . They even checked with us if we needed anything next morning. Parking was a bit challenging in the city (was expected) but other than that everything was great.

This is in a very central location next to famous Dezingof Street in Tel Aviv 5 min from the beach and lots of amazing food options. Totally worth the value with good price. The apartment was family friendly with toys and everything that kept kids happy and comfortable. There was even a high chair for little ones in the dining area.

Wish the carpet in the living room was a bit more cleaner though but considering all other things it did not bother us.

Thank you so much for letting us stay at your place❤️

Definitely recommend having Adi and Ido as your host!
It's an amazing pick for the price!
The pictures of the apartment are misleading. The place look terrible

The main space is full of light and very specious. the bedrooms are not as beautiful or well lit, but are functional, and the mattress in the main bedroom is great. the kitchen is well equipped. We are a family of four and dined in every day. However, you could easily eat out, as the location is central and there are lots of amenities and restaurants around. This means however the the flat is not very quiet. the only quiet bedroom is the main one.
The flat could have been a bit cleaner, but it was reasonably clean. All and all I would recommend it!
The location is fantastic and the apartment is spacious and very comfortable. Close to many grocery stores and just a short walk to the sea. We would definitely rent it again.
Very central and noisy
Adi was amazing host and helps us with everything we needed. The apartment is located at the central of Tel Aviv, and also 5 minutes from the beach. It was great experience.
reviews.response: Thanks!

reviews.comments: Great Location and spacious apartment! Perfect for families also. Would highly recommend
reviews.response: Thanks Daniel!

reviews.comments:
Large specious space for families and friend to social and relax. Great kitchen for cooking together. Large dining table with large windows. We enjoyed our stay. Location is steps from restaurants, the arts, shopping. We enjoyed our week to be able to walk to the fountain.
If you have a car you may want to consider alternative. Parking is a challenge. We parked in the parking garage a few blocks away. However, long waiting periods to get inside and if available.
Host was professional and easy to access the unit with self check in.
Thank you,
HM/RM Florida, USA
reviews.response: Thanks!

reviews.comments: Spacious, well-equipped and centrally located apartment - communication with owner (Adi) worked very well.
reviews.response: Thanks!

reviews.comments: Very central with the beach, shops and restaurants very close by.
Beautiful, clean, spacious and a perfect location. We will definately come back!

The place is super stylish, clean and spacious. It is central, with very cool shops, restaurants and coffee shops. The host is very caring to your needs. We came with an infant, and they were able to rent a crib for us for 8 dollar US a day :) Ido and Adi our family can't thank you enough for everything ❤️
reviews.response: Thanks Annie!

reviews.comments: Excellent location! So close to the beach and bars and restaurants. Can't recommend the location enough! Don't be put off by the shabby building exterior - the apartment is modern inside. However, the bunk bed room needs a clean up - broken mirror and noisy AC unit. Given the great central location though comes with the expected noise levels at night time - this didn't bother us too much but might be an issue for people travelling with children.

Fantastic location, although can at times be slightly noisy with the nearby works going on. Beach is 10 mins walk and the apartment is modern and spacious. Perfect for families, and small groups of friends!
Stylish, brilliantly located and comfortable apartment just a few minutes' walk from Frishman Beach and good cafes, restaurants etc.
Good location near the beach but sometimes noise at night.
Great flat is an excellent location. Adi and Deborah were really helpful with our check out and our stay was an absolute pleasure. Thanks so much!

We stayed at the appartment from 1. -5. May.  We were a group of 4 people and we enjoyed our stay a lot. The appartment was clean, all amenities provided as described and check in and communication with the host in general worked very good. The appartments best feature is the location. If you want to enjoy the city and the beach, this is a perfect spot.
Fantastic apartment in great location. Adi was a delight to deal with and extremely responsive to any request.
fantastic location adi was great host and everything was very efficient
For me it’s the best position to visit Tel Aviv , Appartament is perfect with everything , but very noisy , for night life and traffic in the morning ..

Our family of 5 had a pleasant stay at the apartment for 4 days in June. We enjoyed the local scene, particularly all the nearby cafes and restaurants in Dizengoff St. We also spent a lot of time at the local beaches, they are only a few minutes walk away. Thanks Adi for the quick responses and for the bottle of wine!
Really very good spacious and bright.  But a bit too much noise from street and local bars late at night.

Beautiful apartment!
Amazing thoughtful touches, exceptionally clean. Great position, spacious and room large apartment.
reviews.response: Thank you. Hope to host you again!

reviews.comments:
Very well located apartment. 5 minutes of walk to Yafo beach and close to many bars and restaurants. The place is not suitable for sensible sleepers, because the windows provide zero sound-proof against the street noise.
The twin beds in one of the bedrooms are really small and not suitable for an adult.

Adi and the other guys were very nice and responsive.
The apartment is nice and spacious but noisy more than most of the central apartments we've been to in the past. If you don't mind about this, you will enjoy prime location and nice amenities.
Adi's place was great - fantastic location. I would definitely stay there again.

Very nice hosts, sensational contact. Answered every question very quickly. The flat is very nice, close to the sea, shops and restaurants.
A place worth recommending
reviews.response: Thank you Marta!

reviews.comments: Is a great place to stay in Tel Aviv!

ממליץ מאוד למשפחות! שירות מעולה מצד המארחים.

sehr gute Lage. Kurze Wege zum Strand und zur Hauptstraße mit Restaurants

Adi est très sympa, merci pour le vin !

Super Appartement, Wohnung war wie erwartet, war sauber und adi war super hilfsbereit und sehr nett! Bei fragen antwortete Sie sofort! Nur zu empfehlen! Wohnung war zentral gelegen und man war zu Fuß in 5 min am
Strand!

La situation de cet appartement

L'appartement est très lumineux très confortable spacieux et très bien équipé
Confortable,propre ,
3 chambres permettent d'acceuillir au moins 6 personnes
Eviter la chambre coté de la rue trop bruyante et pas insonorisée
De locatie is perfect. Het appartement is ruim en prettig. Enige nadeel zijn de matrassen. Zeker de matrassen van de kinderkamer moeten vervangen worden.

Apartament w swietnej lokalizacji, kontakt z właścicielem perfekcyjny. Dziękujemy za mozliwosc wcześniejszego check-in oraz późniejszego check-ut!
Ogólne wrazenie psuje bardzo brudna sofa oraz wykładzina w living room.

L'appartement est superbe et très bien situé et parfaitement équipé. Dommage qu'il y ait eu autant de bruit à l'extérieur dus aux travaux à proximité. Le double vitrage aurait vraiment été nécessaire. Quoiqu'il en soit, ns ne regrettons pas notre séjour! Merci aux hôtes pour leur accueil. On a déjà envie de revenir!
